text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Hey, what's up, C.B.? You look 
bored to death! Did ya get lectured 
by a teacher or something?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, you got it right. They scolded 
me for jumping from a window.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
The wind felt nice, y'know, so I
figured jumping from a high place'd be
refreshing. …… Didn't think they'd see
me though.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I gotcha……! From the window, yea
— Well of course! That's freaking
dangerous! Don't do that again!!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
But if you wanna feel refreshed, I got a 
better suggestion. C'mon, look around. 
…… What do you see?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: ? It's just the usual scenery…… and you?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
That's right! C'mon, let's take it
outside! I'll wipe that gloom off your
face in no time!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Oh, are you challenging me? 
Hehe, sounds like fun.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Let's jump over from that roof then!
I'm sure the sky looks beautiful from
up there.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Sure, I'm up for that! 
—— If I wanted to break 
all the bones in my body!!!!
